fields.name: AccountId
fields.description: The DocumentDB account name or ID. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.

fields.name: AccountKey
fields.description: The account key for the DocumentDB account. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.

fields.name: CollectionNamePattern
fields.description: The collection name pattern for the collections to be used. The collection name format can be constructed using the optional {partition} token, where partitions start from 0. See the DocumentDB section of https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/streamanalytics/stream-analytics-output for more information. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.

fields.name: Database
fields.description: The name of the DocumentDB database. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.

fields.name: DocumentId
fields.description: The name of the field in output events used to specify the primary key which insert or update operations are based on.

fields.name: PartitionKey
fields.description: The name of the field in output events used to specify the key for partitioning output across collections. If 'collectionNamePattern' contains the {partition} token, this property is required to be specified.
